Posts.Content: Hi toady1,   i start same drugs as you 2nd march, also feeling anxious and scared but there is lots of information on here about side effects etc of FEC, although obviously it effects people in different ways!! Keep me updated as to how you,re doing,  Take care   Tracey xx
Posts.Title: start chemo next week

Posts.Content: Hi, have to agree with 'have lost that all alone feeling'!!  was diagnosed in december, had masectomy in jan and im due to start 6 FEC chemo cycles on 2nd march, followed by 5wks of RT then hormone therapy... seems a long road ahead of me..but good to know there are so many people willing to encourage and support!!.. thankyou xx Tracey xx
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!
